title: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi Dou Si Niu Yu Gui Huli
title_japanese: 草原豆思之豆思牛与鬼狐狸
synopsis: In the film, it is described that Dousi, Meimei sheep, Xiaoyanniu, and Hongyan, in order to protect the 8000-mile prairie, have launched a series of wits and brave battles with the ghost fox family and the big wolf who dream of ruling the prairie. It has repeatedly defeated the savage big wolf and the insidious ghost fox, showing the cleverness, bravery, wisdom and courage of the grassland friends. (translated from iqiyi)

Sequel.name: Caoyuan Dou Si Zhi X Jiong Tegong
